entry.title: Hockey Captain Evan Buckley
entry.summary:
Author: Jasliz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,858Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Evan Buckley glided across the ice as the LA Kings' youngest captain, scoring another goal for his team, when he was suddenly attacked from behind. Now injured and off the ice for 6-8 weeks, his wonderful fianc√©, Eddie Diaz, is there to help him on his path to recovery, along with everything else along the way.

entry.title: S3 Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,035Chapters: 11/14Kudos: 66

Summary: Buck could ring her hands over and over. it was bad enough that she got blown up by a fire truck. It was bad enough she'd spent 5 months under lock and key. She really does not need to be dealing with all this bullshit, whatever god looks after humanity is cruel. At least now she has somebody to lean on, at least now Eddie knows the truth and she'll be back on the team soon enough. TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

Eddies eyes track the movement, watching semi-entranced as his biceps stretch the fabric of his t-shirt. ‚ÄúKnowing how petty you are? You were probably about to propose we tell them we‚Äôre married or something!‚ÄùEddie innocently looks to the kitchen ceiling and not at Bucks face, which he‚Äôs sure has flushed that pretty pink that compliments his blue eyes so well.Jesus, has he always been this sappy?‚ÄúEddie.‚Äù Buck says. ‚ÄúEddie.‚Äù He stresses again.---or: When the new HOA president, Jason, wages war with Eddie about their "extra house guest" despite the fact that Buck is a resident just as much as the rest of them? entry.title: But you know that you're needing it, And you know that you need it bad
entry.summary:
Author: Jason_Todds_Thigh_Holster

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,459Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 36

Summary: ''What are the facts here, Buck? Tell me them! Because you should know that none of this, absolutely none of the fucked up shit you tell yourself is true. Not even the slightest bit,'' ''It's facts that you want?'' ''You know I do,'' ''Fine, Eds. Here they are, we both know I should be in that coffin six-feet under instead of Bobby,'' ''You didn't..'' Didn't what? Didn't just say that? No, Eddie couldn't ask that because he knows too well that Buck had said it. ''I need you to repeat that, what did you just say, Buck?'' Eddie swallows. He wants to weep, to cry. Cry until there's nothing left. His eyes burn, but he has nothing else to give. He's broken from his spiraling thoughts finding that Buck still hasn't responded. ''No,'' Eddie bleats. ''No, you can't - you cannot say something like that, Buck, don't..'' ''It should've been me, Eddie. It always should've been me instead of Bobby,'' Buck insists, eyes squeezed shut. Willing the fresh gleam of tears to not cascade down the blonde's cheeks. ''And I'd reverse our roles instantly, I'd be the one in that coffin if it wasn't already nailed shut,''

entry.title: Closed Position
entry.summary:
Author: CourtepointeClementine

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,448Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 53

Summary: The song is already a minute in and Buck is starting to feel like he‚Äôs missed his shot. Oh, well. Next one. Maybe. How much does he actually need to know how to dip ‚Äî or dance at all, really?He turns around, and for the third time tonight, he finds Eddie, standing right there. ‚ÄúOh, hey,‚Äù Buck says. ‚ÄúListen, I‚Äôm tired, I think I‚Äôm going to call it.‚ÄùEddie nods. He has a small smile on his flushed face. His hair has escaped its gel hold, strands wisping down onto his forehead. Buck feels his hand start to float up, to brush those strands away, and very smoothly diverts to his own hairline, smoothing his curls like that‚Äôs what he meant to do all along.‚ÄúYou‚Äôve got a ride, right?‚Äù Buck says, shifting from foot to foot.Eddie leans in ‚Äî to be heard over the music? But he keeps moving toward Buck, bringing his arms up so that one hand is on Buck‚Äôs shoulder, and the other is suddenly clasping Buck‚Äôs hand. They are close.

entry.title: When No One was looking
entry.summary:
Author: Karin1232

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,277Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 133

Summary: ‚ÄúBuck?‚Äù Eddie said, knocking on the glass. No response. He tried the door. Locked. ‚ÄúBuck!‚Äù he called again, louder this time, panic rising. Still nothing. Eddie didn‚Äôt hesitate. He grabbed the nearest tool from his truck‚Äîdidn‚Äôt think, didn‚Äôt care‚Äîand shattered the window with one hard strike. The glass fell away, and cold air rushed into the car. OR Buck starts living in his car after being evicted.

entry.title: Catch Me When I Fall
entry.summary:
Author: Ollie_22

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,620Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 154

Summary: ‚ÄòYou‚Äôre in the hospital.‚Äô His sister‚Äìwhat was her name?--supplied. ‚ÄòThere was an accident at work.‚ÄôWork? Where did he work again? In the clouds? Maybe he fell from one of them.‚ÄòDid you want me to get Eddie?‚ÄôA warm feeling bloomed in his chest. Eddie‚Ä¶yes that word was familiar. He nodded, slowly.His sister smiled softly and squeezed his hand. His eyelids drooped, heavy.‚ÄòYou rest.‚Äô Her voice was soft. ‚ÄòEddie will be here when you wake.‚Äô¬†ORBuck has been managing his recent bipolar diagnosis well. He and Eddie are finally together, he's back at work and everything is looking up. That is until, lightning strikes, Buck goes off his meds and well, things spiral from there. (Sequel to 'I didn't Know')

entry.title: You Either Die A Hero
entry.summary:
Author: ThisIsGayAF69

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,982Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Evan Buckley (24) fell through the cracks, desperate for money to fund his sister's medical needs. Becoming a criminal was the only way. What happens when the local Vigilante and thought-to-be-Urban-Legend starts regularly messing up Buck's jobs and getting him into trouble? Edmundo Diaz (24) has spent almost a decade of his life searching for the man that broke his family and left him for dead. Becoming a Vigilante was the only way. What happens when the local, cocky, superpowered asshole keeps getting in his way? (All the regular 9-1-1 cast will make an appearance and be relevant in time)
